name: Raikou
flavorText:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

previous.name: Blissey
previous.flavorText:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

next.name: Entei
next.flavorText:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.
